name: LoveGarden
description:
Fruits and vegetables need love too !

A Match-3 - Dating Sim - Farm simulator game made for Ludum Dare 41.

Fill the needs ☀️💧🌱 of the chosen one of your heart to win. Avoid bad things (🐜 insect and ❄️cold fill the red meter) if you don't want to lose !

Right now, you can date a carrot or a sunflower.

There is no audio.
